ABOUT.HEADLINE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I am Lucas Liebert, a Front-end Developer based in Glienicke/Nordbahn, Germany. I specialize in JavaScript and Angular, with experience in developing web applications, business applications, responsive websites, and browser games.
ABOUT.TEXT1: I have a solid foundation in JavaScript and Angular, focusing on developing engaging and functional web applications. My enthusiasm for modern web technologies drives my continuous learning and growth.
ABOUT.TEXT2: I stay calm and precise under pressure, ensuring efficient work. My effective time management helps me complete projects on schedule, reflecting my commitment to reliability and growth.

SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

PORTFOLIO.HEADLINE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.INTRODUCTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

0.HEADLINE: Join
0.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

1.HEADLINE: Fallen Angels
1.DESCRIPTION: A web-based game where you control your character to fight various enemies with different abilities. The ultimate goal is to defeat the final boss.

2.HEADLINE: Pokedex
2.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive collection of all existing Pokémon, complete with detailed descriptions of their characteristics, abilities, and unique attributes, accessible via an API.

3.HEADLINE: QuizApp
3.DESCRIPTION: A small, simple multiple-choice quiz function designed to enhance learning through interactive questions and answers.
